   A gripping psychological thriller about a woman who disappears on her fifth wedding anniversary, leaving behind only her enigmatic husband.

Based on their message, they seem interested in the mystery genre. Here are two movie recommendations from this list: 

1. "Gone Girl" (2014) - directed by David Fincher and based on the novel of the same name by Gillian Flynn. The story follows the disappearance of Alice Johnson (played by Rosamund Pike)) and her husband Nick Dunn (played by Ben Affleck)). The movie has been praised for its intricate plot, strong performances, and thought-provoking themes.

2. "The Machinist" (2005) - directed by David Fidler and based on the novel of the same name by Richard K. Morgan. The story follows former U.S. Army officer John Doe (played by Christian Bale)) who has been missing for over two years, and his daughter Allegra Doe (played by Kristen Wiig)). The movie has been praised for its intricate plot, strong performances, and thought-provoking themes.

I hope these recommendations are helpful to you!
